Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.CaseController Class Reference

The CaseController administrates the different cases being provided in the document folder of the user. Each case requires several steps in their correct order to be performed. Based on voice inputs the user is either in the training mode or the case mode. The steps can be changed to a previous / following step as long as the user is in the training mode. In the case mode the steps have to be followed accordingly to get to the next step. More...

 Appends a message to the case information display.
 
void StartCase ()
 Starts a case. When in training mode return error as voice feedback. If the case has no steps play no more steps.
 
void ShowAll ()
 Shows all case steps. Return voice feedback "Error" if in train mode and if the case contains no steps play "No more steps".

Detailed Description

The CaseController administrates the different cases being provided in the document folder of the user. Each case requires several steps in their correct order to be performed. Based on voice inputs the user is either in the training mode or the case mode. The steps can be changed to a previous / following step as long as the user is in the training mode. In the case mode the steps have to be followed accordingly to get to the next step.
